about_the_game:
Cultist Astronaut is currently in Alpha. We are refining the game into a solid shooter platformer. If you are interested in Cultist Astronaut and want to show your support, please Wishlist and follow us.

You can also join our Discord and chat with the devs and community:

Travel Across the Cosmos and Obliterate Cultic Factions

Cults are scattered across the universe scheming, performing rituals, and polluting the cosmos with their heresy.

Cultist Astronaut is a 2D action adventure in a cult infested universe. Travel planet to planet, explore corrupted civilizations, and fight back against cults and their champions. The mission is to unify the universe under your cult for the doom god!

If you like classic shooter, platformers then this game is for you.

Game Features

  • Side-scrolling platformer shooter with wall sliding and gun choice

  • Tackle the cults in any order you choose!

  • Explore distinct planets across the Cosmos. Survive in apocalyptic wastes, delve into toxic caves, and crash a castle.

  • Absorb the souls of your enemies and power up your gun.

  • Unlock new weapons by defeating Cult leaders.

  • Challenge yourself to get a new highscore or beat the game at the highest soul level.

Explore a Bizarre Star System

The planets of Cultist Astronaut consist of ominous cults, twisted abominations, and hazardous locations to tackle.

Excoria, once a simple mining outpost, became the foundation of the Flayed Cult. As miners unearthed a statue of a skinless deity, they were struck with the Rockskin disease, turning their skin to stone. In their search for relief, they found that shedding their hardened skin brought momentary respite and spiritual clarity. Thus, the Flayed Cult was born, centered around this act of purification. Led by the Flayed King, they believe in a prophecy: the return of the Great Skinless One who will cleanse the galaxy. Their rituals are intense, and their faith, unwavering.

You can also visit Sludge Haven, the home of the Imposters, where you fight Nobodies, Somebodies, Anybody, and Everybody. This place is infested with worm-like aliens who have lost all sense of self. To fill this void, they started mimicking the personalities and lifestyles of others, which eventually consumed them and caused the downfall of their society. They even scavenge for junk and corpses to further their identities!

content_descriptors.notes: Enemies explode into pieces and surfaces are splattered with blood.

short_description: Run and gun through a galaxy of cults and doom! This fast-paced, action platformer puts you in the hooves of a Goatling armed with a Eldritch gun and a fierce attitude towards heretics.
